official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Delaware River in Pennsylvania and New Jersey as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a segment of the Delaware River in Pennsylvania and New Jersey as a component of the national wild and scenic rivers system.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Delaware River in Pennsylvania and New Jersey as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and other purposes.
